commentary_text: Francois Letexier will referee today's match.
The players are out and the match is about to start. England will have the kick-off.
Here we go, today's match is starting right now.
A long cross from the side is directed to the well-positioned Lamine Yamal (Spain), but the defence gets it clear.
Lamine Yamal (Spain) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.
Dani Olmo (Spain) sends a lofted cross into the penalty area. Unfortunately for him, the opponent's defence deals with his cross comfortably and intercepts it.
Nico Williams (Spain) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack. Spain get a corner.
Nico Williams (Spain) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence.
Spain seem to be finding their feet as they enjoy some possession. Great movement by the offensive players allows the defenders to set up the attack.
Dani Olmo (Spain) sends a quick through ball into space for his teammate who is lurking close to the offside line, but one of the defenders intercepts and clears the danger.
Rodri (Spain) was trying to get to the ball but clattered into the legs of the opponent as well. Francois Letexier blows his whistle for an infringement.
Marc Guehi (England) commits a foul during an attacking move.
Nico Williams (Spain) goes on a weaving run through the defence and gets within shooting range but his effort is blocked. The referee points to the corner flag and Spain will take a corner.
Nico Williams (Spain) looks like he will be the one to try and deliver a quality ball into the penalty box from the corner kick.
Robin Le Normand (Spain) wins the ball from the corner kick and strikes. The effort lacks accuracy and goes miles wide of the left post.
Nico Williams (Spain) tries to send a pass but it's blocked.
Kyle Walker (England) sends a sweet pass into the penalty area, but one of the defenders averts the danger.
Phil Foden (England) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.
Declan Rice (England) receives a good pass just outside the box, unleashes a strike from a promising position, but the shot is blocked by the defender.
Another attempt to send the ball beyond the defence by Dani Olmo (Spain) is thwarted and cleared to safety.
Daniel Carvajal (Spain) sends a cross into the box, but Jordan Pickford comes off his line to gather the ball.
Marc Cucurella (Spain) makes a strong challenge and Francois Letexier blows for a foul.
Lamine Yamal (Spain) sends a long ball in, but Jordan Pickford comfortably gathers the ball.
A pass lands at the feet of Lamine Yamal (Spain) in the middle of the box, he looks up and shoots but the effort is superbly blocked by a defender.
Spain take a short corner kick.
A lofted cross from Nico Williams (Spain) is unsuccessful as the opponent's defence quickly clears the ball out of the penalty area.
Francois Letexier blows his whistle after Daniel Carvajal (Spain) kicks an opponent's legs instead of the ball.
It must be a yellow card. It is. Harry Kane (England) receives the caution after an awful tackle.
Fabian Ruiz (Spain) is having a really tough time right now. We are about to find out how serious his injury is.
Fabian Ruiz (Spain) seems to be alright and is okay to carry on.
69:31 â€“ the ratio of ball possession.
Fabian Ruiz (Spain) blasts the ball from just outside the box, but his attempt is blocked by the defender.
Yellow card. Dani Olmo (Spain) goes into the book for a bad tackle on his opponent.
Lamine Yamal (Spain) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him. The ball goes out of play and Spain have been awarded a corner kick.
Lamine Yamal (Spain) takes the corner which is cleared by the opposition's defence. Spain have been awarded a corner kick.
Nico Williams (Spain) decides to speed play up with a short corner kick.
Dani Olmo (Spain) has an effort from distance but it's blocked.
Nico Williams (Spain) plays in a hopeful cross, but it doesn't find its way to any of the attacking players. The ball goes out of play and England will have a goal kick.
Daniel Carvajal (Spain) dinks a cross into the box in an attempt to find one of his teammates, but the defence manages to clear.
John Stones (England) slides a pass forward, but one of the defenders cuts it out.
Alvaro Morata (Spain) latches on to a pin-point through ball, but one of the defending players dispossess him. Brilliant defending. Spain have a corner.
Nothing comes of the resulting corner from Nico Williams (Spain). The defence is alert and manages to cut it out.
Harry Kane (England) collects a pass from the flank, looks up and fires in a goal-bound shot from the edge of the box which canons off a defender to safety.
Nico Williams (Spain) brings his opponent down with a tackle and Francois Letexier blows his whistle for a foul. England have a free kick.
We will have 2 min. of added time.

Phil Foden (England) clutches his head in despair after he blew a huge opportunity! He received the ball after the free kick, took a good first touch and unleashed a projectile from close range to the bottom left corner, but Unai Simon makes a nice save.
That is it for the first half after the referee blows his whistle and the players head to their respective dressing rooms.
Francois Letexier blows his whistle and the second half starts.
Luis de la Fuente has decided to make a substitution during the half-time break. Martin Zubimendi comes on the pitch for Rodri (Spain).
Goal - 1:0! Lamine Yamal tees up Nico Williams (Spain) inside the box and he rolls the ball into the bottom right corner and past Jordan Pickford.

Ambitious effort from Dani Olmo (Spain). He finds himself in a great position after collecting a precise pass inside the penalty area and goes for goal, but it never troubles the goalkeeper and flies well wide of the right post.
Kyle Walker (England) sends over a cross from the side into the penalty area in order to find one of his teammates, but he fails and the opportunity goes begging.
John Stones (England) has to be very careful for the rest of the match after receiving a yellow card from the referee for a bad tackle on an opponent.
Alvaro Morata (Spain) tries his luck with and strikes the ball towards goal from long-range, but it is blocked by one of the defenders.
Alvaro Morata (Spain) latched on to an accurate pass deep into the box and attempted to fire the ball past the keeper, but the shot is way off target. What a miskick!
Fine attempt! Nico Williams (Spain) collects a pass and manages to hold off the defender, then rifles in a shot from mid-range which unluckily swerves inches past the left post.
Spain are showing great team chemistry. They are passing it around beautifully. Excellent team work.
Another attempt to send the ball beyond the defence by Dani Olmo (Spain) is thwarted and cleared to safety.
Phil Foden (England) tries to pass the ball into the penalty area but it's blocked.
Gareth Southgate has decided to make a change. Ollie Watkins (England) replaces Harry Kane.
Rough tackle by Nico Williams (Spain). The referee blows his whistle for a foul.
Phil Foden (England) swings in a promising cross from the free kick, but one of the defenders does a perfect job to avert the danger.
Nico Williams (Spain) is having a lively performance. He is causing problems and wanting the ball at every opportunity.
Jude Bellingham (England) skips perfectly past challenges but misdirects his shot from the edge of the box. The ball flies a few yards wide of the left post.
Kyle Walker (England) sends a long ball forward to Ollie Watkins, but he put too much power and the chance is gone. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Spain.

Lamine Yamal (Spain) receives a pass inside the box, controls the ball and drills it towards the left post. Unfortunately for him, Jordan Pickford makes a great save to stop his effort. Spain earn a corner.
Nico Williams (Spain) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.
It is time for a substitution. Mikel Oyarzabal (Spain) is on for Alvaro Morata.

Lamine Yamal (Spain) attempts to set up his teammate with a scoring opportunity by chipping in a fine pass from the edge of the box, but one of the defenders intercepts his effort. Spain will have a chance to score from a corner kick.
Lamine Yamal (Spain) sends the corner into the box, but Jordan Pickford intercepts it and averts the threat.
Dani Olmo (Spain) sends a teasing cross into the area, but Jordan Pickford intercepts the ball.
That's unlucky! Fabian Ruiz (Spain) side steps a tackle after receiving a pass, advances then hits a booming shot from mid-range which only rises at the last second to fly just over the bar.
A substitution has been made. Kobbie Mainoo goes off and Cole Palmer (England) comes on.
The linesman signals that Lamine Yamal (Spain) is offside and the referee confirms the decision.
Mikel Oyarzabal (Spain) darts into the penalty area to latch on to a pass, and he unleashes a low shot in the direction of the left post. Jordan Pickford is alert and denies him with a nice save.
Goal! Jude Bellingham finds Cole Palmer (England) with a clever pass. He steps inside his man on the edge of the box and whips a tremendous shot into the bottom left corner. Fantasy football! 1:1.
Bukayo Saka (England) passes the ball into the box but an opposing player clears.
The cross into the penalty area from Daniel Carvajal (Spain) needed to be more accurate in order to create a goal-scoring opportunity for his team.

Nico Williams (Spain) attempts to send over a cross in order to find one of his teammates, but an opposition defender averts the danger by intercepting the effort. Spain have been awarded a corner kick.
The corner from Nico Williams (Spain) is intercepted by the defence.

Lamine Yamal (Spain) receives a precise pass in the box and takes the shot early. The ball heads towards the middle of the goal, but Jordan Pickford shows off his skills and makes a brilliant save to deny him.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Robin Le Normand leaves the pitch and Nacho Fernandez (Spain) comes on.

Nico Williams (Spain) and Dani Olmo attempt to exchange short two-yard passes, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball. The ball is out of play. A goal-scoring opportunity from a corner for Spain.
Lamine Yamal (Spain) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.
It's in the back of the net! Marc Cucurella is the provider as he slips the ball to Mikel Oyarzabal (Spain) who simply steers it home from close range. It's 2:1.
Ollie Watkins (England) received a clever through ball which could have put him in a promising position, but the defence was alert to the danger.
Substitution. Phil Foden will be replaced by Ivan Toney (England).
Luis de la Fuente has decided to substitute Lamine Yamal and he is replaced by Mikel Merino (Spain).
Cole Palmer (England) steps up to send the ball in.
Declan Rice (England) peeled away from his marker and got on the end of the resulting corner, but he sends his header straight at the goalkeeper.

A huge opportunity wasted! Marc Guehi (England) produces a header from a rebound inside the six-yard box. His effort is denied by one of the defenders who is well positioned and clears the ball to safety.
Declan Rice (England) is furious with himself. He collects a rebound near the penalty spot, and powers a header narrowly over the bar!
4 min. of stoppage-time to be played.
What was Ollie Watkins (England) thinking? He will not get away with that. The referee shows him a yellow card.
A cross from the free kick is whipped in by Jordan Pickford (England), but one of the defenders steps in and averts the threat.
Bukayo Saka (England) commits a foul and Francois Letexier immediately signals a free kick.
There will be no more action in this match as the referee signals full time.
